attributes.action: Ensure the Spanish government ceases to encroach territorial waters in the Strait of Gibraltar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Urge the British government to strongly denounce Spain's latest attempt to force the issue of Gibraltar's sovereignty.  Request that the government of Great Britain forces the EU to revoke the ruling granting Spain legal rights to terrotorial waters around Gibraltar.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
